channel.title: [iClarity] Project 05/06
channel.description:
[ul]As some of you may know, I've started working on a runescape 2005/2006 remake. I am using I Roll Deep's xEpicz v1.0 base. I am not starting with a with a blank iClarity base mainly because I'm new to iClarity and as most people that are new to things, they use these types for learning the basics.
Anyways, now onto my development.
As many of you know, red means not started, blue means started but not done, and green means done.
[list] [li]Fix this log in interface( probably will need help):
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6733x4.jpg[/img]
Next I will have to fix these smithing images.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15d2umg.png[/img]
Most interfaces are correct. So basically I'm working on interfaces right now
Going to fix the door system( some gates and doors dont open)
Working on the tutorial for tutorial island [/li] [li][/li] [/list] Now skill related/ Quests:
[list] [li]add about 3-5 free to play quests and about 5 member quests, encluding a quest that you have to kill 3 demons ( first lesser, then greater, then jungle demon)
Fix up skilling skills [/li] [li][/li] [/list]
Now combat related issues: [list] [li] Npc no-clipping (with pic, look closely you'll see it's in an object):
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29w0mrm.png[/img]
[/li] [li][/li] [/list] [u][b]Please note, That this is a 2005/2006 remake meaning theres none of this:[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2i8atg2.jpg[/img]
[u][b]That means No godwars and no god wars armour. [/b][/u] [size=12pt][u][b] Update log:[/b][/u][/size]
[list] [li]Changed a few dialogues and names around.[/li] [li]Fixed spawning commands so that new players can't spawn[/li] [li]Fixed the npc hp.[/li][/list] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/10pc08l.png[/img]
[list][li]Added some more npcs, Been extremely busy with irl shit[/li][/list] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zdu3ow.png[/img]
Added firemaking! Wewt! 99% credits I Roll Deep, 1% me for changing timer and etc. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/15z5lqg.png[/img] [u][b]This isn't the first time I've coded a 317 base, but this is my first official server development[/b][/u][/ul]

http://www.rune3-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/185268-non-renamed-making-some-interfaces-fullscreen-perfect-yellow-tooltip.html
For the fullscreen login. Idk if yours is renamed or what but w.e

I’ve tried it but I think I’ve done something wrong

Just added firemaking thanks to you

Glad I’ve helped

tbh on this project, you’ve been an extremely great help.

Nice to know

yup and now ima work on those buttons in the music tab
[/quote]
gl gl[/quote]

Thanks, update will be posted tonight

item.title: [iClarity] Project 05/06
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I Roll Deep, post:67, topic:414138”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=516097.msg3754918#msg3754918 date=1316369764]

Rip it. It’s completely fine because it’s teaching you how the client communicates with those certain packets. As long as you learn something out of it, then it’s fine.

By ripping I mean trial and error with your own code, mimicking the other sources methods.

yeah, but Idk really how to with that >.>, I can rip a lot of shit just not the welcome screen interface. Since most of the sources that I’ve coded do not have this interface.

EDIT:

1zdu3ow.png770×505

sorry for the length… been busy for a shit load of time.

Bump o.o
[/quote]
Make NPC’s move, looks noobish this way…[/quote]

they do move, it’s just when I took the pic they all were like that.

Read full topic
